mapper.select: select info.id, info.company_id, info.apply_type, info.apply_date, info.apply_thing_type, info.company_role, info.company_name, info.city_code, info.area_code, info.province_code, info.contact_name, info.contact_phone, info.is_delete, role.role_name, province.province_name, city.city_name, area.area_name, info.transact_type from pc_apply_info info left join user_role_set role on info.company_role = role_code left join province province on info.province_code = province.province_code left join city city on city.city_code = info.city_code left join area area on info.area_code = area.area_code where info.id = #{id} and info.is_delete = 0
